body.name: Foldable Mini Washing Machine,Small Washing Machine for Underwear,Laundry, Camping, RV, Travel, Underwear, Socks, Baby clothes Lightweight and Easy to Carry (ABS-Green) Touch key

features: 【Compact and Portable】Mini portable folding washing machine, with a size of 27*27*20cm.when unfolded and 27*14*20cm when folded, and with a dehydration function, equipped with a dehydration basket .

【Suitable for】Upgrade to a larger capacity that can accommodate 6 liters. Ideal for cleaning lightweight clothing that requires separate cleaning, such as baby clothing, underwear, towels, socks, or other small items. Using both positive and negative kneading, coupled with high-frequency washing, effectively removes stains.

【Strong Stain Removal 】This washing machine provides all round rubbing, positive and negative hand washing; with quick washing, to achieve strong stain removal effect.Coming with blue ray,It is really suitable for washing underwear or baby clothes. Keep healthy for you and your family.
【Folding Design】Press down folding, lightweight, easy to move, easy to store in a small space. Ideal for camping, vacation, business travel, apartments, dormitories, and won't take up too much space.

【Easy to Operate】One button operation, long press on the key for two seconds to start or stop, and equipped with a 5 minute and 10 minute timed washing button, and a 1 minute dehydration button. Simple and convenient, with multiple functions to serve you.
body.description: How to use: 1: Plug in the power supply . 2: Press the bottom button, and after 2 seconds, the washing machine will start 3: Select the cleaning time. There are three icons from left to right. The first icon has a standard washing time of 5minutes, the second icon has a soft washing time of 10 minutes, and the third icon has a half dehydration time of 2 minutes (the icon is lit to indicate which cleaning mode has been selected). Short press the bottom button to change to different cleaning modes. 4: After cleaning, please press the bottom button. After 2 seconds, the washing machine will stop . Note: If you want to repeat the cleaning, you can repeat the above operation

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For small or delicate items this is awesome.
reviews.reviewText: For your delicate items this mini washer is awesome.I've used mine nearly every day since I got it and I honestly love it.The cycles are super simple: wash or spin. There's no rinse cycle on its own, but that's workable.The spin cycle isn't going to be as thorough as a regular washer but it'll spin out some of the excess liquid.I'm really pleased with this little machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was so excited to get this produce. Thought it would be great for soaking and washing my Norwex products. Had good reviews so I thought I’d give it a try. When I plugged it in to use it wouldn’t make connection to turn on. There was either a short in the electrical wiring, or the plug terminal was spread so it wouldn’t make contact. If you wiggled the wire and hit it just right it would turn on but then you had to hold ot on place to finish cycling. So disappointed and returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: excellent for washing my children s uniforms it dries very well and can be stored wherever you want you can even take it on trips
